item.description: CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1295; 06:19PM; 12300 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/37UWyUl; #Sylmar; Firefighers quickly knocked down the flames, holding the fire to less than one acre. Crews will remain on scene to fortify perimeter lines and eliminate hot spots and smoldering material within the burn. No reported injuries. No structures damaged. Cause under investigation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC15 CM42 E18 E275 E28 E287 E7 E70 E75 E8 E81 E87 E98 EM15 H3 H4 H5 HA3 HA4 HA5 RA75 RA90 T75 T87; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1295; 05:51PM; 12300 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/37UWyUl; #Sylmar; Approximately one acre of light-to-medium brush burning. Light wind. No structures threatened.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E18 E275 E287 E7 E75 E87 E98 EM15 H3 H4 HA3 HA4 RA75 RA90 T75 T87; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Major Emergency Brush Fire 05/17/2022 INC#0993

item.description: Update Major Emergency Brush Fire; INC#0993; 05:00PM; 2675 N Nottingham Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/37U4GEJ; #LosFeliz; A person-of-interest (in the general area of the incident) was questioned by LAPD and is in custody. The cause of the fire remains under active investigation in a joint effort by LAPD and LAFD's Arson Investigators. Refer additional questions to LAPD. Nothing further.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 AR17 BC11 BC2 BC5 CE59 CM42 CM52 CW3A E11 E20 E220 E227 E235 E27 E29 E290 E35 E41 E52 E56 E61 E76 E82 E86 EM11 EM55 H3 H4 H5 HA3 HA4 HA5 PI1 PI2 RA35 RA56 RA90 T20 T27 T35 T90; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

title.a: CONTAINED Major Emergency Brush Fire 05/17/2022 INC#0993

item.description: CONTAINED Major Emergency Brush Fire; INC#0993; 03:55PM; 2675 N Nottingham Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/37U4GEJ; #LosFeliz; Currently, 92 firefighters are battling this major emergency brush fire (with assistance from LAFD Crew 3 volunteer hand crew), which has burned approximately 6 acres of medium brush. Nearly all active flame has been eliminated and forward progress stopped after one hour and twelve minutes. MEDIA: PIO Captain Scott and PIO Firefighter David Ortiz are en route, ETA 4:00pm. Media please stage at 2675 Nottingham Ave. No reported injuries. Cause remains under investigation.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 AR17 BC11 BC2 BC5 CE59 CM42 CM52 CW3A E11 E20 E220 E227 E235 E27 E29 E290 E35 E41 E52 E56 E61 E76 E82 E86 EM11 EM55 H3 H4 H5 HA3 HA4 HA5 RA35 RA90 T20 T27 T35 T90; CH5; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Brush Fire; INC#0993; 03:25PM; 2675 N Nottingham Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/37U4GEJ; #LosFeliz; The fire has grown to approximately 4 acres, as firefighters continue to attack by ground and air, a response which has now been classified as a "Major Emergency." Griffith Observatory has now been evacuated and Park Rangers are assisting with public safety by keeping hikers from entering the nearby trails. No homes have been evacuated.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM42 CM52 E11 E20 E220 E227 E235 E27 E29 E290 E35 E41 E52 E56 E61 E76 E82 E86 EM11 EM55 H3 H4 H5 HA3 HA4 HA5 RA35 T20 T27 T35 T90; CH5; 13; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#0993; 02:43PM; 2675 N Nottingham Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/37U4GEJ; #LosFeliz; LAFD responding by ground and air to an approximately 50' x 100' area of vegetation on fire, light-to-medium wind, south of Griffith Observatory near the Boy Scout Trail.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC11 BC5 E20 E220 E227 E27 E290 E35 E52 E56 E76 E82 EM11 H3 H4 H5 HA3 HA4 HA5 RA35 T20 T27 T90; CH5; 13; Nicholas Prange

Fatal Traffic Collision; INC#1203; 04:34PM; WB 210 Fwy x La Tuna Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3z2zPhk; #ShadowHills; Firefighters arrived at the scene of a vehicle vs. big rig to find two persons deceased at the scene. Nothing further. CHP Log 2138.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E274 E289 E298 E77 E91 EM14 HR3 RA74 RA75 RA898 T74 T89 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update Brush Fire; INC#1088; 03:30PM; 11200 Porter Ranch Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FRlIQu; #PorterFire; After approximately 24 hours, there continues to be hot spots and active flames within the burn footprint, however the perimeter of the fire has remain unchanged since yesterday evening. After a more thorough survey, the fire was found to be held to just 4.09 acres. The area remains under continuous monitoring by LAFD firefighters ("fire watch"). Crews remaining in the area are positioned to ensure the current perimeter holds. No reported injuries.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 AR1 BC10 BC12 BC15 BC17 BP109 CE59 CE83 CM42 E100 E103 E105 E106 E107 E109 E18 E23 E28 E287 E290 E296 E36 E37 E39 E42 E48 E55 E63 E67 E7 E70 E72 E73 E8 E84 E88 E93 E99 EA1 EM14 EM17 H2 H4 H5 HA2 HA4 HA5 PI3 RA107 RA96 RI600 T87 T90 T96 WT88; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Grass Fire; INC#0752; 01:14PM; WB 90 Fwy x Culver Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G5jZHr; #DelRey; It took just over an hour for 30 firefighters to stop forward progress, and contain the burn to approximately 2 acres of medium-heavy brush. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; AR1 AR21 BC11 BC4 E263 E295 E58 E62 E63 E94 PH1 RA63 T63 T95; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Grass Fire; INC#0752; 12:01PM; WB 90 Fwy x Culver Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3G5jZHr; #DelRey; Approximately two acres of grass and medium brush on fire between the eastbound and westbound portions of the Marina Expressway (east of the Marina del Rey Garden Center). No structures threatened. Portions of the Marina Expressway are shut down for responder safety.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; AR1 BC11 BC4 E263 E295 E58 E62 E63 E94 RA63 T63 T95; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange
